Package main.boundary.modelviewer

Class CampViewer

java.lang.Object
main.boundary.modelviewer.CampViewer
public class CampViewer extends Object
The class provides methods for viewing and interacting with camp details

    • findCampByID

      public static Camp findCampByID(List<Camp> campList, String campID)
      Finds a camp in the list based on its unique ID
      Parameters:
      campList - the list of camps to search from
      campID - the ID of the camp to find in the list
      Returns:
      the camp with the specified ID or null if not found
